A <a href="https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/" class="link" target="_blank">ggplot2</a>-inspired grammar of graphics for interactive visualisations via <a href="https://antv.alipay.com/zh-cn/g2/3.x/" class="link" target="_blank">g2</a>.

## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("JohnCoene/g2r")
```

## Synthax

From ggplot2 to g2r.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
df <- dplyr::tribble(
  ~"ggplot2",       ~"g2r",
  "aes",            "asp",
  "scale_*",        "gauge_*",
  "geom_*",         "fig_*",
  "facet_*",        "plane_*",
  "theme_*",        "style_*"
)

knitr::kable(df)
```

## Example

It's looks familiar to ggplot2.

<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-6">

### ggplot

```{r, fig.height = 8}
library(ggplot2)

iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(Petal.Length, Petal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(.~Species)
```

</div>
<div class="col-md-6">

### g2r

```{r}
library(g2r)

iris %>%
  g2(asp(Petal.Length, Petal.Width, color = Species)) %>% 
  fig_point() %>%
  plane_wrap(planes(Species))
```
</div>
</div>
